website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality electric skateboard with a number of desirable features you won't find in other models.
pros: This remote-controlled electric skateboard features a high-density deck that has a waterproof, anti-slip surface for safety
It supports up to 286 pounds and can travel at a maximum speed of 19 mph under optimum conditions
cons: The remote control may be a little too sensitive for beginners who aren't yet comfortable with skateboarding

customer_reviews.title: AZBO skateboard is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This skateboard is simply AWESOME! I've had it for a while now, and just cant get enough of it. It has great power and will even haul my 220 pounds up hill.
customer_reviews.author: Wmpahis

customer_reviews.title: Really fast and powerful.
customer_reviews.text: This skateboard is able to push me around without a problem. That's incredible considering I'm tall and heavy. It's really fun riding around with the skateboard. The handheld remote has all the buttons that you need to maneuver around. I like that there are several speed settings for the skateboard. The slowest one is the easiest and great for practicing.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Florencia

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 3 days. Trucks were too lose so I hit a speed wobble and fell off of it which caused me to have a hair line fracture on my shoulder. Not worth the price or time
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S.

customer_reviews.title: How to replace a lost remote or other parts
customer_reviews.text: Amazing board. I absolutely love it. I have some questions. What happens if I loose the remote? I can’t find the manufacturer website online. Are there other replacement parts I can buy? I’m typically hard on my toys. I’m only taking one star away because of my unanswered questions
customer_reviews.author: JonMichael Smith

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: Its super heavy but heavy with powerful electronics. Goes fast and the breaks work very good. Ive only tried one other kind of electric board and this ones better w the only con of inevitable weight. I havent used it long enough to know if the battery is ok but so far its quite literally a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This my JAM!
customer_reviews.text: I love this board!!!!!!! I ride it in my neighborhood to the gym that’s three miles away. Good to go on roads and sidewalks. I’m 200 lbs and I don’t even take it to the fastest level, this thing is fast. I wanna try the off road on now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This skateboard lasted about 30 days and 50 miles before the battery gave out. I’ve emailed the company directly to replace it and it’s been a difficult process. I would not recommend this product or this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skateboard Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great mid- range price for a top of the line product! And when the dog ate the remote, they replaced it - no questions asked!
customer_reviews.author: Roger P. Frelier

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely Displeased with the quality of this board this is the second board I have owned in less than two weeks and I am extremely upset. I’m upset with the customer service. I’m upset with the quality of the board and how it’s made. I’m upset with the maple because it cracked right when I stood on it I tried to do a flex test and I still on the board and try to see how flexible it was and it cracked right away in other words I would never buy from this company ever again
customer_reviews.author: michael hager

customer_reviews.title: Very Fast and Smooth
customer_reviews.text: So far this board is pretty impressive. But it's too soon to give a final rating. I'll be tracking the miles, hours, and minutes over the next several months. I didn't get any pads with my order as the add includes but, no big deal. I wasn't buying it for that reason. Stay tuned, I'll let you know how this board is doing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Price

product_meta.title: AZBO Electric Skateboard Longboard with Remote Control - Gift Protective Gear Set & 2000W Dual Hub Motor UL2272 Certified/High Speed 25 MPH Motorized Wireless H6 Board - 19 Miles Range
feature_bullets: 🏄‍[DURABLE & STABLE] - AZBO e-skateboards have this lovely shape that provides a comfortable yet responsive platform for you to stand on. AZBO boards strike a perfect balance.

🏄‍♂️[WIRELESS REMOTE] - Rechargeable wireless remote controller for easy forward, brake, speed switching, and battery indicator. This electric board, therefore, provides extremely smooth acceleration or deceleration while you ride.
🏄‍♂️[SPEED & RANGE] - You can reach a maximum speed of up to 19 MPH with an in-hub 2000W motor. Equipped with 6.6 AH battery, fully charged for only 2 hours.

🏄‍♂️[STURDY & SECURE] - The 8-ply maple deck has superior strength in comparison with other boards, the max supported weight is 286 lbs. High-density Emery Non-slip and Waterproof Surface Makes you safer while riding on the skateboard.

🏄‍♂️[CONTROL & WARRANTY] - The AZBO high speed longboard feels powerful yet controlled under your feet. This board is also ideal for people who skillfully own a board. Also, you get a one year warranty that will allow you to replace in case of breakage product.
